text.name: sys_description
text.text: The PlayStation Classic is a dedicated video game console from Sony that emulates the games originally released on its 1994 PlayStation console. It was announced in September 2018 for the 24th anniversary of the original's release. The console was compared to previous versions of Nintendo's NES Classic and Super NES Classic mini-consoles. Despite this, the console received negative reviews for its low game library, use of the stock controller, use of PAL versions for some games, and high price. It's still mere emulation.
